name: Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel

reviews.name: Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText: This Shimano Sedona 2500 is the best value for a 6.2:l reel I have found. It feels good in your hand, and it has a very smooth retrieve. I used it on Buggs Island (Kerr Lake) again today.
reviews.title: 02 October 2011

reviews.name: Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText:
It's a great reel, smooth and I went on line and ordered another spare spool to make this a light and medium level fishing reel.
I still have Shimanos from decades back that just wont quit.
BTW I am not notgeek2 -can't change in the review window offered
Don L
reviews.title: How do you beat a Shimano?

reviews.name: Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText: Very smooth action and retrieve looking forward to many years of use
reviews.title: Shimano good quality reasonable price

reviews.name: Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText: 1 was very pleased with my Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel. It was as good as expected.
reviews.title: Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel

reviews.name: Shimano Sedona FD Front Drag Spinning Reel
reviews.reviewText: A very good reel for this price range.
reviews.title: Shimana Sedona 4000
